subsection.name: Simple XML validation
subsection.p: You can validate a document in one click

subsection.name: Batch XML Validation
subsection.p: You can validate a batch of xml files and/or directories and choose the extensions of the files you want to validate.

subsection.name: Validation against external schema
subsection.p: This validation allows you to validate a document against a schema which is not necessarily associated to a document.

section.name: Schema documentation
section.p: You can generate the documentation for DTDS or X

section.name: XSLT Transformations
section.p: You can transform XML format to HTML, XHTML, SVG, XSLFO, XML, TXT or PDF formats
Various XSLT Processors can be used such as Xalan, Saxon 6.5.x or Saxon 8.x

section.name: Code indentation
section.p: Code indentation is supported for XML, XHTML and HTML documents.

section.name: Code completion
section.p: Code completion is enabled via modules

section.name: Multiple installers
section.p: Software installers are available for the following platforms:Windows, Linux, Unix, FreeBSD. There is also a cross-platform installer and a Java Web Start installer.

section.name: Plugin support
section.p: This new development branch of XPontus XML Editor is built around modules
This allows a shameless plug of new features without hardcoding stuff or lots of development and refractoring
